title: Handle a Utility Billing Dispute
description: A customer disputes their water bill, claiming the meter reading must be wrong.

tasks.description: Identify the customer and the bill in question.
tasks.expected_outcome: Agent locates the customer's account and the disputed bill.

tasks.description: Review the meter reading history for anomalies.
tasks.expected_outcome: Agent reviews the history and sees a consistent pattern of usage, with no obvious errors.

tasks.description: Explain the findings to the customer and offer to schedule a meter accuracy test.
tasks.expected_outcome: Agent communicates the findings and offers a path to resolution for the customer.
